subject: Title IX (Gender Discrimination Legislation)
Athletics and Sports
Women and Girls
Blacks
College Athletics
Race and Ethnicity
organizations: Schomburg Center for Research in Black Culture
lead_paragraph: A 40-year-old law has failed to complete the job it set out to do: preventing “discrimination under any education program or activity receiving federal financial assistance.”
snippet: A 40-year-old law has failed to complete the job it set out to do: preventing “discrimination under any education program or activity receiving federal financial assistance.”
